description: Vagrant interacts with HashiCorp services to provide update notifications.
name: Vagrant

telemetry.description: Vagrant does occasional network calls to check whether the version of Vagrant that is running locally is up to date.
telemetry.name: Vagrant update check

telemetry.description: By default, Vagrant will query the metadata API server to see if a newer box version is available for download.
telemetry.name: Vagrant box update check
